Albany.Gorham House: Gorham House, also known as Elliot House, is a historic home located at Loudonville in Albany County, New York. It was built in 1926 and is a 2-story, five-bay Colonial Revival–style brick dwelling with flanking ​1 1⁄2-story wings. It was built partially of recycled materials from the 1806 Hegeman house in Vischer Ferry, New York.
